attributes.action: extend motability to include buying or leasing a motorhome, tourer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Motability is there to help assist disabled with the freedom that every person should have, the motability part of the dla payments can be used for the hp of a car, we think it should be extended for the hp or purchase of motorhomes/caravans, to enable disabled carers to be able to enjoy the same freedom to have a holiday and travel, which many cannot afford due to having had to leave work due to illness or to care for a disabled friend/relative.
